SEARCH
Package controller

Class SearchBuyToy

java.lang.Object
controller.SearchBuyToy
public class SearchBuyToy extends Object
The SearchBuyToy class represents a class that allows the user to search for and purchase toys from a ToyList.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) AppMenus
    appMenu
    An instance of AppMenus class to access the menu functionality.
    (package private) ArrayList<Toy>
    matches
    An ArrayList of Toy objects to store the search results.
    (package private) SearchResults
    searchResults
    An instance of SearchResults class to display the search results.
    (package private) ToyList
    toyList
    An instance of ToyList class to add the new toy to the list.
    (package private) ValidateInput
    validateIn
    An instance of ValidateInput class to validate user input.

      An ArrayList of Toy objects to store the search results.

      An instance of SearchResults class to display the search results.

  • Constructor Details

    • SearchBuyToy

      public SearchBuyToy(ToyList toyList)
      Constructor that creates a new SearchBuyToy object with a given ToyList object.
      Parameters:
      toyList - The ToyList object containing the list of all available toys.

  • Method Details

    • launchSearch

      public void launchSearch()
      Launches the toy search application by initializing AppMenus, SearchResults, and calling the Search method.

    • Search

      private void Search()
      Private method used for handling the search option functionality of the application.

    • displayAndPurchase

      private void displayAndPurchase()
      Displays the search results and prompts the user to select a toy to purchase. If the user selects a toy to purchase, the method updates the available quantity of the toy and displays a success message, otherwise the method terminates the transaction and returns to the search menu.

    • searchBySN

      private void searchBySN(String sn)
      Searches for toys by serial number and adds them to the matches list.
      Parameters:
      sn - The serial number of the toy to search for.

    • searchByName

      private void searchByName(String tn)
      Searches for toys by name and adds them to the matches list.
      Parameters:
      tn - The name of the toy to search for.

    • searchByType

      private void searchByType(String type)
      Searches the toyList for toys of a specific type and adds them to the matches list.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of toys to search for.
